TopicTitle: Looking for a camera model for my techtree plugin

Articles.Content:
Hi there, modders and modellers.

I am looking for a part model to use as a space camera for a techtree overhaul i am currently preparing.

Ideally, it should be a small surface-attachable part about the size of the smallest surface-attachable battery or the barometer.

Since my modelling skills are abysmal, I am looking for someone who wants to make or has already made such a part and allows me to include it in my project (with appropriate credits in the release post etc. of course).

Cheers,

SirJodelstein

Try to reach that guy, i'm sure you two can figure something out.

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2gira8/i_managed_to_create_a_part_for_ksp_ujoepatrick1/

Edit: Also, for science instruments, you should contact Dmagic, his mod rocks!

Edited September 18, 2014 by mouzfun
